German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Latin collēga

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [kɔˈleːɡə]
    audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Kollege m (genitive Kollegen, plural Kollegen, female Kollegin)

  1. colleague, buddy, mate, workmate, fellow member, fellow student, fellow worker, co-worker, (slang) homie (male or of unspecified sex)

Declension[edit]

Declension of Kollege
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinderKollegedieKollegen
genitiveeinesdesKollegenderKollegen
dativeeinemdemKollegendenKollegen
accusativeeinendenKollegendieKollegen
